00026 /*
00027  * lustre/target/update_recovery.c
00028  *
00029  * This file implement the methods to handle the update recovery.
00030  *
00031  * During DNE recovery, the recovery thread will redo the operation according
00032  * to the transaction no, and these replay are either from client replay req
00033  * or update replay records(for distribute transaction) in the update log.
00034  * For distribute transaction replay, the replay thread will call
00035  * distribute_txn_replay_handle() to handle the updates.
00036  *
00037  * After the Master MDT restarts, it will retrieve the update records from all
00038  * of MDTs, for each distributed operation, it will check updates on all MDTs,
00039  * if some updates records are missing on some MDTs, the replay thread will redo
00040  * updates on these MDTs.
00041  *
00042  * Author: Di Wang <di.wang@intel.com>
00043  */
00044 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00045 
00046 #include <lu_target.h>
00047 #include <lustre_obdo.h>
00048 #include <lustre_update.h>
00049 #include <lustre_swab.h>
00050 #include <md_object.h>
00051 #include <obd.h>
00052 #include <obd_class.h>
00053 
00054 #include "tgt_internal.h"
00055 
00069 static struct distribute_txn_replay_req *
00070 dtrq_lookup(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd, __u64 batchid)
00071 {
00072         struct distribute_txn_replay_req        *tmp;
00073         struct distribute_txn_replay_req        *dtrq = NULL;
00074 
00075         list_for_each_entry(tmp, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_list, dtrq_list) {
00076                 if (tmp->dtrq_batchid == batchid) {
00077                         dtrq = tmp;
00078                         break;
00079                 }
00080         }
00081         return dtrq;
00082 }
00083 
00098 static int dtrq_insert(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
00099                         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *new)
00100 {
00101         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *iter;
00102 
00103         /* Check if the dtrq has been added to the list */
00104         iter = dtrq_lookup(tdtd, new->dtrq_batchid);
00105         if (iter != NULL)
00106                 return -EEXIST;
00107 
00108         list_for_each_entry_reverse(iter, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_list, dtrq_list) {
00109                 if (iter->dtrq_master_transno > new->dtrq_master_transno)
00110                         continue;
00111 
00112                 /* If there are mulitple replay req with same transno, then
00113                  * sort them with batchid */
00114                 if (iter->dtrq_master_transno == new->dtrq_master_transno &&
00115                     iter->dtrq_batchid > new->dtrq_batchid)
00116                         continue;
00117 
00118                 list_add(&new->dtrq_list, &iter->dtrq_list);
00119                 break;
00120         }
00121 
00122         if (list_empty(&new->dtrq_list))
00123                 list_add(&new->dtrq_list, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_list);
00124 
00125         return 0;
00126 }
00127 
00140 static struct distribute_txn_replay_req *
00141 dtrq_create(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
00142             struct llog_update_record *lur)
00143 {
00144         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *new;
00145 
00146         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(new);
00147         if (new == NULL)
00148                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00149 
00150         new->dtrq_lur_size = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00151         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(new->dtrq_lur, new->dtrq_lur_size);
00152         if (new->dtrq_lur == NULL) {
00153                 OBD_FREE_PTR(new);
00154                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00155         }
00156 
00157         memcpy(new->dtrq_lur, lur, new->dtrq_lur_size);
00158 
00159         /* If the transno in the update record is 0, it means the
00160          * update are from master MDT, and it will use the master
00161          * last committed transno as its master transno. Later, if
00162          * the update records are gotten from slave MDTs, then these
00163          * transno will be replaced.
00164          * See insert_update_records_to_replay_list(). */
00165         if (lur->lur_update_rec.ur_master_transno == 0) {
00166                 new->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_master_transno =
00167                                 tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_last_committed;
00168                 new->dtrq_master_transno =
00169                                 tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_last_committed;
00170         } else {
00171                 new->dtrq_master_transno =
00172                                 lur->lur_update_rec.ur_master_transno;
00173         }
00174 
00175         new->dtrq_batchid = lur->lur_update_rec.ur_batchid;
00176 
00177         spin_lock_init(&new->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00178         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new->dtrq_sub_list);
00179         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new->dtrq_list);
00180 
00181         RETURN(new);
00182 }
00183 
00196 struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub *
00197 dtrq_sub_lookup(struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq, __u32 mdt_index)
00198 {
00199         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub *dtrqs = NULL;
00200         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub *tmp;
00201 
00202         list_for_each_entry(tmp, &dtrq->dtrq_sub_list, dtrqs_list) {
00203                 if (tmp->dtrqs_mdt_index == mdt_index) {
00204                         dtrqs = tmp;
00205                         break;
00206                 }
00207         }
00208         return dtrqs;
00209 }
00210 
00223 static int dtrq_sub_add_cookie(struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub *dtrqs,
00224                                struct llog_cookie *cookie)
00225 {
00226         struct sub_thandle_cookie *new;
00227 
00228         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(new);
00229         if (new == NULL)
00230                 return -ENOMEM;
00231 
00232         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new->stc_list);
00233         new->stc_cookie = *cookie;
00234         /* Note: only single thread will access one sub_request each time,
00235          * so no need lock here */
00236         list_add(&new->stc_list, &dtrqs->dtrqs_cookie_list);
00237 
00238         return 0;
00239 }
00240 
00253 static int
00254 dtrq_sub_create_and_insert(struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq,
00255                            struct llog_cookie *cookie,
00256                            __u32 mdt_index)
00257 {
00258         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub    *dtrqs = NULL;
00259         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub    *new;
00260         int                                     rc;
00261         ENTRY;
00262 
00263         spin_lock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00264         dtrqs = dtrq_sub_lookup(dtrq, mdt_index);
00265         spin_unlock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00266         if (dtrqs != NULL) {
00267                 rc = dtrq_sub_add_cookie(dtrqs, cookie);
00268                 RETURN(0);
00269         }
00270 
00271         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(new);
00272         if (new == NULL)
00273                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00274 
00275         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new->dtrqs_list);
00276         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new->dtrqs_cookie_list);
00277         new->dtrqs_mdt_index = mdt_index;
00278         spin_lock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00279         dtrqs = dtrq_sub_lookup(dtrq, mdt_index);
00280         if (dtrqs == NULL) {
00281                 list_add(&new->dtrqs_list, &dtrq->dtrq_sub_list);
00282                 dtrqs = new;
00283         } else {
00284                 OBD_FREE_PTR(new);
00285         }
00286         spin_unlock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00287 
00288         rc = dtrq_sub_add_cookie(dtrqs, cookie);
00289 
00290         RETURN(rc);
00291 }
00292 
00307 static int dtrq_append_updates(struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq,
00308                                struct update_records *record)
00309 {
00310         struct llog_update_record *new_lur;
00311         size_t lur_size = dtrq->dtrq_lur_size;
00312         void *ptr;
00313         ENTRY;
00314 
00315         /* Because several threads might retrieve the same records from
00316          * different targets, and we only need one copy of records. So
00317          * we will check if the records is in the next one, if not, just
00318          * skip it */
00319         spin_lock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00320         if (dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_index + 1 != record->ur_index) {
00321                 spin_unlock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00322                 RETURN(0);
00323         }
00324         dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_index++;
00325         spin_unlock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00326 
00327         lur_size += update_records_size(record);
00328         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(new_lur, lur_size);
00329         if (new_lur == NULL) {
00330                 spin_lock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00331                 dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_index--;
00332                 spin_unlock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00333                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00334         }
00335 
00336         /* Copy the old and new records to the new allocated buffer */
00337         memcpy(new_lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur_size);
00338         ptr = (char *)&new_lur->lur_update_rec +
00339                 update_records_size(&new_lur->lur_update_rec);
00340         memcpy(ptr, &record->ur_ops,
00341                update_records_size(record) -
00342                offsetof(struct update_records, ur_ops));
00343 
00344         new_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_update_count += record->ur_update_count;
00345         new_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count += record->ur_param_count;
00346         new_lur->lur_hdr.lrh_len = llog_update_record_size(new_lur);
00347 
00348         /* Replace the records */
00349         OBD_FREE_LARGE(dtrq->dtrq_lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur_size);
00350         dtrq->dtrq_lur = new_lur;
00351         dtrq->dtrq_lur_size = lur_size;
00352         dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_flags = record->ur_flags;
00353         update_records_dump(&new_lur->lur_update_rec, D_INFO, true);
00354         RETURN(0);
00355 }
00356 
00372 int
00373 insert_update_records_to_replay_list(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
00374                                      struct llog_update_record *lur,
00375                                      struct llog_cookie *cookie,
00376                                      __u32 mdt_index)
00377 {
00378         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq;
00379         struct update_records *record = &lur->lur_update_rec;
00380         bool replace_record = false;
00381         int rc = 0;
00382         ENTRY;
00383 
00384         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: insert record batchid = "LPU64" transno = "LPU64
00385                " mdt_index %u\n", tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name,
00386                record->ur_batchid, record->ur_master_transno, mdt_index);
00387 
00388         /* Update batchid if necessary */
00389         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
00390         if (record->ur_batchid >= tdtd->tdtd_batchid) {
00391                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s update batchid from "LPU64 " to "LPU64"\n",
00392                        tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name,
00393                        tdtd->tdtd_batchid, record->ur_batchid);
00394                 tdtd->tdtd_batchid = record->ur_batchid + 1;
00395         }
00396         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_batchid_lock);
00397 
00398 again:
00399         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00400         /* First try to build the replay update request with the records */
00401         dtrq = dtrq_lookup(tdtd, record->ur_batchid);
00402         if (dtrq == NULL) {
00403                 spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00404                 dtrq = dtrq_create(tdtd, lur);
00405                 if (IS_ERR(dtrq))
00406                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(dtrq));
00407 
00408                 spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00409                 rc = dtrq_insert(tdtd, dtrq);
00410                 if (rc < 0) {
00411                         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00412                         dtrq_destroy(dtrq);
00413                         if (rc == -EEXIST)
00414                                 goto again;
00415                         return rc;
00416                 }
00417         } else {
00418                 /* If the master transno in update header is not
00419                 * matched with the one in the record, then it means
00420                 * the dtrq is originally created by master record,
00421                 * so we need update master transno and reposition
00422                 * the dtrq(by master transno) in the list and also
00423                 * replace update record */
00424                 if (record->ur_master_transno != 0 &&
00425                     dtrq->dtrq_master_transno != record->ur_master_transno &&
00426                     dtrq->dtrq_lur != NULL) {
00427                         list_del_init(&dtrq->dtrq_list);
00428                         dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_master_transno =
00429                                                 record->ur_master_transno;
00430 
00431                         dtrq->dtrq_master_transno = record->ur_master_transno;
00432                         replace_record = true;
00433                         /* try to insert again */
00434                         rc = dtrq_insert(tdtd, dtrq);
00435                         if (rc < 0) {
00436                                 spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00437                                 dtrq_destroy(dtrq);
00438                                 return rc;
00439                         }
00440                 }
00441         }
00442         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00443 
00444         /* Because there should be only thread access the update record, so
00445          * we do not need lock here */
00446         if (replace_record) {
00447                 /* Replace the update record and master transno */
00448                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(dtrq->dtrq_lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur_size);
00449                 dtrq->dtrq_lur = NULL;
00450                 dtrq->dtrq_lur_size = llog_update_record_size(lur);
00451                 OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(dtrq->dtrq_lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur_size);
00452                 if (dtrq->dtrq_lur == NULL)
00453                         return -ENOMEM;
00454 
00455                 memcpy(dtrq->dtrq_lur, lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur_size);
00456         }
00457 
00458         /* This is a partial update records, let's try to append
00459          * the record to the current replay request */
00460         if (record->ur_flags & UPDATE_RECORD_CONTINUE)
00461                 rc = dtrq_append_updates(dtrq, record);
00462 
00463         /* Then create and add sub update request */
00464         rc = dtrq_sub_create_and_insert(dtrq, cookie, mdt_index);
00465 
00466         RETURN(rc);
00467 }
00468 EXPORT_SYMBOL(insert_update_records_to_replay_list);
00469 
00480 void dtrq_list_dump(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd, unsigned int mask)
00481 {
00482         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq;
00483 
00484         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00485         list_for_each_entry(dtrq, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_list, dtrq_list)
00486                 update_records_dump(&dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec, mask,
00487                                     false);
00488         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00489 }
00490 EXPORT_SYMBOL(dtrq_list_dump);
00491 
00499 void dtrq_destroy(struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq)
00500 {
00501         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub    *dtrqs;
00502         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub    *tmp;
00503 
00504         LASSERT(list_empty(&dtrq->dtrq_list));
00505         spin_lock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00506         list_for_each_entry_safe(dtrqs, tmp, &dtrq->dtrq_sub_list, dtrqs_list) {
00507                 struct sub_thandle_cookie *stc;
00508                 struct sub_thandle_cookie *tmp;
00509 
00510                 list_del(&dtrqs->dtrqs_list);
00511                 list_for_each_entry_safe(stc, tmp, &dtrqs->dtrqs_cookie_list,
00512                                          stc_list) {
00513                         list_del(&stc->stc_list);
00514                         OBD_FREE_PTR(stc);
00515                 }
00516                 OBD_FREE_PTR(dtrqs);
00517         }
00518         spin_unlock(&dtrq->dtrq_sub_list_lock);
00519 
00520         if (dtrq->dtrq_lur != NULL)
00521                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(dtrq->dtrq_lur, dtrq->dtrq_lur_size);
00522 
00523         OBD_FREE_PTR(dtrq);
00524 }
00525 EXPORT_SYMBOL(dtrq_destroy);
00526 
00534 void dtrq_list_destroy(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd)
00535 {
00536         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq;
00537         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *tmp;
00538 
00539         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00540         list_for_each_entry_safe(dtrq, tmp, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_list,
00541                                  dtrq_list) {
00542                 list_del_init(&dtrq->dtrq_list);
00543                 dtrq_destroy(dtrq);
00544         }
00545         list_for_each_entry_safe(dtrq, tmp, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_finish_list,
00546                                  dtrq_list) {
00547                 list_del_init(&dtrq->dtrq_list);
00548                 dtrq_destroy(dtrq);
00549         }
00550         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00551 }
00552 EXPORT_SYMBOL(dtrq_list_destroy);
00553 
00564 struct distribute_txn_replay_req *
00565 distribute_txn_get_next_req(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd)
00566 {
00567         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq = NULL;
00568 
00569         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00570         if (!list_empty(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list)) {
00571                 dtrq = list_entry(tdtd->tdtd_replay_list.next,
00572                                  struct distribute_txn_replay_req, dtrq_list);
00573                 list_del_init(&dtrq->dtrq_list);
00574         }
00575         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00576 
00577         return dtrq;
00578 }
00579 EXPORT_SYMBOL(distribute_txn_get_next_req);
00580 
00589 __u64 distribute_txn_get_next_transno(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd)
00590 {
00591         struct distribute_txn_replay_req        *dtrq = NULL;
00592         __u64                                   transno = 0;
00593 
00594         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00595         if (!list_empty(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list)) {
00596                 dtrq = list_entry(tdtd->tdtd_replay_list.next,
00597                                  struct distribute_txn_replay_req, dtrq_list);
00598                 transno = dtrq->dtrq_master_transno;
00599         }
00600         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00601 
00602         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: Next update transno "LPU64"\n",
00603                tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name, transno);
00604         return transno;
00605 }
00606 EXPORT_SYMBOL(distribute_txn_get_next_transno);
00607 
00608 struct distribute_txn_replay_req *
00609 distribute_txn_lookup_finish_list(struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
00610                                   __u64 xid)
00611 {
00612         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq = NULL;
00613         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *iter;
00614 
00615         spin_lock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00616         list_for_each_entry(iter, &tdtd->tdtd_replay_finish_list, dtrq_list) {
00617                 if (iter->dtrq_xid == xid) {
00618                         dtrq = iter;
00619                         break;
00620                 }
00621         }
00622         spin_unlock(&tdtd->tdtd_replay_list_lock);
00623         return dtrq;
00624 }
00625 
00626 bool is_req_replayed_by_update(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00627 {
00628         struct lu_target *tgt = class_exp2tgt(req->rq_export);
00629         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq;
00630 
00631         if (tgt->lut_tdtd == NULL)
00632                 return false;
00633 
00634         dtrq = distribute_txn_lookup_finish_list(tgt->lut_tdtd, req->rq_xid);
00635         if (dtrq == NULL)
00636                 return false;
00637 
00638         return true;
00639 }
00640 EXPORT_SYMBOL(is_req_replayed_by_update);
00641 
00659 static int update_is_committed(const struct lu_env *env,
00660                                struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq,
00661                                struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00662                                struct top_thandle *top_th,
00663                                struct sub_thandle *st)
00664 {
00665         struct seq_server_site  *seq_site;
00666         const struct lu_fid     *fid = lu_object_fid(&dt_obj->do_lu);
00667         struct distribute_txn_replay_req_sub    *dtrqs;
00668         __u32                   mdt_index;
00669         ENTRY;
00670 
00671         if (st->st_sub_th != NULL)
00672                 RETURN(1);
00673 
00674         if (st->st_committed)
00675                 RETURN(0);
00676 
00677         seq_site = lu_site2seq(dt_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_site);
00678         if (fid_is_update_log(fid) || fid_is_update_log_dir(fid)) {
00679                 mdt_index = fid_oid(fid);
00680         } else if (!fid_seq_in_fldb(fid_seq(fid))) {
00681                 mdt_index = seq_site->ss_node_id;
00682         } else {
00683                 struct lu_server_fld *fld;
00684                 struct lu_seq_range range = {0};
00685                 int rc;
00686 
00687                 fld = seq_site->ss_server_fld;
00688                 fld_range_set_type(&range, LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT);
00689                 LASSERT(fld->lsf_seq_lookup != NULL);
00690                 rc = fld->lsf_seq_lookup(env, fld, fid_seq(fid),
00691                                          &range);
00692                 if (rc < 0)
00693                         RETURN(rc);
00694                 mdt_index = range.lsr_index;
00695         }
00696 
00697         dtrqs = dtrq_sub_lookup(dtrq, mdt_index);
00698         if (dtrqs != NULL || top_th->tt_multiple_thandle->tmt_committed) {
00699                 st->st_committed = 1;
00700                 if (dtrqs != NULL) {
00701                         struct sub_thandle_cookie *stc;
00702                         struct sub_thandle_cookie *tmp;
00703 
00704                         list_for_each_entry_safe(stc, tmp,
00705                                                  &dtrqs->dtrqs_cookie_list,
00706                                                  stc_list)
00707                                 list_move(&stc->stc_list, &st->st_cookie_list);
00708                 }
00709                 RETURN(0);
00710         }
00711 
00712         CDEBUG(D_HA, "Update of "DFID "on MDT%u is not committed\n", PFID(fid),
00713                mdt_index);
00714 
00715         RETURN(1);
00716 }
00717 
00737 static int update_recovery_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00738                                   struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00739                                   const struct update_op *op,
00740                                   const struct update_params *params,
00741                                   struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00742                                   struct thandle *th)
00743 {
00744         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
00745         struct llog_update_record *lur = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur;
00746         struct lu_attr          *attr = &uti->uti_attr;
00747         struct obdo             *wobdo;
00748         struct obdo             *lobdo = &uti->uti_obdo;
00749         struct dt_object_format dof;
00750         __u16                   size;
00751         unsigned int            param_count;
00752         int rc;
00753         ENTRY;
00754 
00755         if (dt_object_exists(dt_obj))
00756                 RETURN(-EEXIST);
00757 
00758         param_count = lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
00759         wobdo = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[0],
00760                                             param_count, &size);
00761         if (wobdo == NULL)
00762                 RETURN(-EIO);
00763         if (size != sizeof(*wobdo))
00764                 RETURN(-EIO);
00765 
00766         if (LLOG_REC_HDR_NEEDS_SWABBING(&lur->lur_hdr))
00767                 lustre_swab_obdo(wobdo);
00768 
00769         lustre_get_wire_obdo(NULL, lobdo, wobdo);
00770         la_from_obdo(attr, lobdo, lobdo->o_valid);
00771 
00772         dof.dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(attr->la_mode);
00773 
00774         rc = out_tx_create(env, dt_obj, attr, NULL, &dof,
00775                            ta, th, NULL, 0);
00776 
00777         RETURN(rc);
00778 }
00779 
00780 static int update_recovery_destroy(const struct lu_env *env,
00781                                    struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00782                                    const struct update_op *op,
00783                                    const struct update_params *params,
00784                                    struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00785                                    struct thandle *th)
00786 {
00787         int rc;
00788         ENTRY;
00789 
00790         rc = out_tx_destroy(env, dt_obj, ta, th, NULL, 0);
00791 
00792         RETURN(rc);
00793 }

00800                                    struct thandle *th)

00802         int rc;
00803         ENTRY;
00804

00806 
00807         RETURN(rc);
00808 }

00825 static int update_recovery_attr_set(const struct lu_env *env,
00826                                     struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00827                                     const struct update_op *op,
00828                                     const struct update_params *params,
00829                                     struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00830                                     struct thandle *th)
00831 {
00832         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
00833         struct llog_update_record *lur = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur;
00834         struct obdo     *wobdo;
00835         struct obdo     *lobdo = &uti->uti_obdo;
00836         struct lu_attr  *attr = &uti->uti_attr;
00837         __u16           size;
00838         unsigned int    param_count;
00839         int             rc;
00840         ENTRY;
00841 
00842         param_count = lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
00843         wobdo = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[0],
00844                                             param_count, &size);
00845         if (wobdo == NULL)
00846                 RETURN(-EIO);
00847         if (size != sizeof(*wobdo))
00848                 RETURN(-EIO);
00849 
00850         if (LLOG_REC_HDR_NEEDS_SWABBING(&lur->lur_hdr))
00851                 lustre_swab_obdo(wobdo);
00852 
00853         lustre_get_wire_obdo(NULL, lobdo, wobdo);
00854         la_from_obdo(attr, lobdo, lobdo->o_valid);
00855 
00856         rc = out_tx_attr_set(env, dt_obj, attr, ta, th, NULL, 0);
00857 
00858         RETURN(rc);
00859 }
00860 
00861 static int update_recovery_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env,
00862                                      struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00863                                      const struct update_op *op,
00864                                      const struct update_params *params,
00865                                      struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00866                                      struct thandle *th)
00867 {
00868         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
00869         char            *buf;
00870         char            *name;
00871         int             fl;
00872         __u16           size;
00873         __u32           param_count;
00874         int             rc;
00875         ENTRY;
00876 
00877         param_count = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
00878         name = update_params_get_param_buf(params,
00879                                            op->uop_params_off[0],
00880                                            param_count, &size);
00881         if (name == NULL)
00882                 RETURN(-EIO);
00883 
00884         buf = update_params_get_param_buf(params,
00885                                           op->uop_params_off[1],
00886                                           param_count, &size);
00887         if (buf == NULL)
00888                 RETURN(-EIO);
00889 
00890         uti->uti_buf.lb_buf = buf;
00891         uti->uti_buf.lb_len = (size_t)size;
00892 
00893         buf = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[2],
00894                                           param_count, &size);
00895         if (buf == NULL)
00896                 RETURN(-EIO);
00897         if (size != sizeof(fl))
00898                 RETURN(-EIO);
00899 
00900         fl = le32_to_cpu(*(int *)buf);
00901 
00902         rc = out_tx_xattr_set(env, dt_obj, &uti->uti_buf, name, fl, ta, th,
00903                               NULL, 0);
00904 
00905         RETURN(rc);
00906 }
00907 
00908 static int update_recovery_index_insert(const struct lu_env *env,
00909                                         struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00910                                         const struct update_op *op,
00911                                         const struct update_params *params,
00912                                         struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00913                                         struct thandle *th)
00914 {
00915         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
00916         struct lu_fid           *fid;
00917         char                    *name;
00918         __u32                   param_count;
00919         __u32                   *ptype;
00920         __u32                   type;
00921         __u16                   size;
00922         int rc;
00923         ENTRY;
00924 
00925         param_count = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
00926         name = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[0],
00927                                            param_count, &size);
00928         if (name == NULL)
00929                 RETURN(-EIO);
00930 
00931         fid = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[1],
00932                                           param_count, &size);
00933         if (fid == NULL)
00934                 RETURN(-EIO);
00935         if (size != sizeof(*fid))
00936                 RETURN(-EIO);
00937 
00938         fid_le_to_cpu(fid, fid);
00939 
00940         ptype = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[2],
00941                                             param_count, &size);
00942         if (ptype == NULL)
00943                 RETURN(-EIO);
00944         if (size != sizeof(*ptype))
00945                 RETURN(-EIO);
00946         type = le32_to_cpu(*ptype);
00947 
00948         if (dt_try_as_dir(env, dt_obj) == 0)
00949                 RETURN(-ENOTDIR);
00950 
00951         uti->uti_rec.rec_fid = fid;
00952         uti->uti_rec.rec_type = type;
00953 
00954         rc = out_tx_index_insert(env, dt_obj,
00955                                  (const struct dt_rec *)&uti->uti_rec,
00956                                  (const struct dt_key *)name, ta, th,
00957                                  NULL, 0);
00958 
00959         RETURN(rc);
00960 }
00961 
00962 static int update_recovery_index_delete(const struct lu_env *env,
00963                                         struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00964                                         const struct update_op *op,
00965                                         const struct update_params *params,
00966                                         struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00967                                         struct thandle *th)
00968 {
00969         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
00970         __u32   param_count;
00971         char    *name;
00972         __u16   size;
00973         int     rc;
00974         ENTRY;
00975 
00976         param_count = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
00977         name = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[0],
00978                                            param_count, &size);
00979         if (name == NULL)
00980                 RETURN(-EIO);
00981 
00982         if (dt_try_as_dir(env, dt_obj) == 0)
00983                 RETURN(-ENOTDIR);
00984 
00985         rc = out_tx_index_delete(env, dt_obj,
00986                                  (const struct dt_key *)name, ta, th, NULL, 0);
00987 
00988         RETURN(rc);
00989 }
00990 
00991 static int update_recovery_write(const struct lu_env *env,
00992                                  struct dt_object *dt_obj,
00993                                  const struct update_op *op,
00994                                  const struct update_params *params,
00995                                  struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
00996                                  struct thandle *th)
00997 {
00998         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
00999         char            *buf;
01000         __u32           param_count;
01001         __u64           pos;
01002         __u16           size;
01003         int rc;
01004         ENTRY;
01005 
01006         param_count = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
01007         buf = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[0],
01008                                           param_count, &size);
01009         if (buf == NULL)
01010                 RETURN(-EIO);
01011 
01012         uti->uti_buf.lb_buf = buf;
01013         uti->uti_buf.lb_len = size;
01014 
01015         buf = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[1],
01016                                           param_count, &size);
01017         if (buf == NULL)
01018                 RETURN(-EIO);
01019 
01020         pos = le64_to_cpu(*(__u64 *)buf);
01021 
01022         rc = out_tx_write(env, dt_obj, &uti->uti_buf, pos,
01023                           ta, th, NULL, 0);
01024 
01025         RETURN(rc);
01026 }
01027 
01028 static int update_recovery_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env,
01029                                      struct dt_object *dt_obj,
01030                                      const struct update_op *op,
01031                                      const struct update_params *params,
01032                                      struct thandle_exec_args *ta,
01033                                      struct thandle *th)
01034 {
01035         struct update_thread_info *uti = update_env_info(env);
01036         __u32   param_count;
01037         char    *name;
01038         __u16   size;
01039         int     rc;
01040         ENTRY;
01041 
01042         param_count = uti->uti_dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec.ur_param_count;
01043         name = update_params_get_param_buf(params, op->uop_params_off[0],
01044                                            param_count, &size);
01045         if (name == NULL)
01046                 RETURN(-EIO);
01047 
01048         rc = out_tx_xattr_del(env, dt_obj, name, ta, th, NULL, 0);
01049 
01050         RETURN(rc);
01051 }
01052 
01066 static void update_recovery_update_ses(struct lu_env *env,
01067                                       struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
01068                                       struct thandle *th,
01069                                       struct thandle *master_th,
01070                                       struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq,
01071                                       struct tx_arg *ta_arg)
01072 {
01073         struct tgt_session_info *tsi;
01074         struct lu_target        *lut = tdtd->tdtd_lut;
01075         struct obd_export       *export;
01076         struct cfs_hash         *hash;
01077         struct top_thandle      *top_th;
01078         struct lsd_reply_data   *lrd;
01079         size_t                  size;
01080 
01081         tsi = tgt_ses_info(env);
01082         if (tsi->tsi_exp != NULL)
01083                 return;
01084 
01085         size = ta_arg->u.write.buf.lb_len;
01086         lrd = ta_arg->u.write.buf.lb_buf;
01087         if (size != sizeof(*lrd) || lrd == NULL)
01088                 return;
01089 
01090         lrd->lrd_transno         = le64_to_cpu(lrd->lrd_transno);
01091         lrd->lrd_xid             = le64_to_cpu(lrd->lrd_xid);
01092         lrd->lrd_data            = le64_to_cpu(lrd->lrd_data);
01093         lrd->lrd_result          = le32_to_cpu(lrd->lrd_result);
01094         lrd->lrd_client_gen      = le32_to_cpu(lrd->lrd_client_gen);
01095 
01096         if (lrd->lrd_transno != tgt_th_info(env)->tti_transno)
01097                 return;
01098 
01099         hash = cfs_hash_getref(lut->lut_obd->obd_gen_hash);
01100         if (hash == NULL)
01101                 return;
01102 
01103         export = cfs_hash_lookup(hash, &lrd->lrd_client_gen);
01104         if (export == NULL) {
01105                 cfs_hash_putref(hash);
01106                 return;
01107         }
01108 
01109         tsi->tsi_exp = export;
01110         tsi->tsi_xid = lrd->lrd_xid;
01111         tsi->tsi_opdata = lrd->lrd_data;
01112         tsi->tsi_result = lrd->lrd_result;
01113         tsi->tsi_client_gen = lrd->lrd_client_gen;
01114         dtrq->dtrq_xid = lrd->lrd_xid;
01115         top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle, tt_super);
01116         top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle = master_th;
01117         cfs_hash_putref(hash);
01118 }
01119 
01137 static int update_recovery_exec(const struct lu_env *env,
01138                                 struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
01139                                 struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq,
01140                                 struct thandle_exec_args *ta)
01141 {
01142         struct llog_update_record *lur = dtrq->dtrq_lur;
01143         struct update_records   *records = &lur->lur_update_rec;
01144         struct update_ops       *ops = &records->ur_ops;
01145         struct update_params    *params = update_records_get_params(records);
01146         struct top_thandle      *top_th = container_of(ta->ta_handle,
01147                                                        struct top_thandle,
01148                                                        tt_super);
01149         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
01150         struct update_op        *op;
01151         unsigned int            i;
01152         int                     rc = 0;
01153         ENTRY;
01154 
01155         /* These records have been swabbed in llog_cat_process() */
01156         for (i = 0, op = &ops->uops_op[0]; i < records->ur_update_count;
01157              i++, op = update_op_next_op(op)) {
01158                 struct lu_fid           *fid = &op->uop_fid;
01159                 struct dt_object        *dt_obj;
01160                 struct dt_object        *sub_dt_obj;
01161                 struct dt_device        *sub_dt;
01162                 struct sub_thandle      *st;
01163 
01164                 if (op->uop_type == OUT_NOOP)
01165                         continue;
01166 
01167                 dt_obj = dt_locate(env, tdtd->tdtd_dt, fid);
01168                 if (IS_ERR(dt_obj)) {
01169                         rc = PTR_ERR(dt_obj);
01170                         break;
01171                 }
01172                 sub_dt_obj = dt_object_child(dt_obj);
01173 
01174                 /* Create sub thandle if not */
01175                 sub_dt = lu2dt_dev(sub_dt_obj->do_lu.lo_dev);
01176                 st = lookup_sub_thandle(tmt, sub_dt);
01177                 if (st == NULL) {
01178                         st = create_sub_thandle(tmt, sub_dt);
01179                         if (IS_ERR(st))
01180                                 GOTO(next, rc = PTR_ERR(st));
01181                 }
01182 
01183                 /* check if updates on the OSD/OSP are committed */
01184                 rc = update_is_committed(env, dtrq, dt_obj, top_th, st);
01185                 if (rc == 0)
01186                         /* If this is committed, goto next */
01187                         goto next;
01188 
01189                 if (rc < 0)
01190                         GOTO(next, rc);
01191 
01192                 /* Create thandle for sub thandle if needed */
01193                 if (st->st_sub_th == NULL) {
01194                         rc = sub_thandle_trans_create(env, top_th, st);
01195                         if (rc != 0)
01196                                 GOTO(next, rc);
01197                 }
01198 
01199                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "replay %uth update\n", i);
01200                 switch (op->uop_type) {
01201                 case OUT_CREATE:
01202                         rc = update_recovery_create(env, sub_dt_obj,
01203                                                     op, params, ta,
01204                                                     st->st_sub_th);
01205                         break;
01206                 case OUT_DESTROY:
01207                         rc = update_recovery_destroy(env, sub_dt_obj,
01208                                                      op, params, ta,
01209                                                      st->st_sub_th);
01210                         break;
01211                 case OUT_REF_ADD:
01212                         rc = update_recovery_ref_add(env, sub_dt_obj,
01213                                                      op, params, ta,
01214                                                      st->st_sub_th);
01215                         break;
01216                 case OUT_REF_DEL:
01217                         rc = update_recovery_ref_del(env, sub_dt_obj,
01218                                                      op, params, ta,
01219                                                      st->st_sub_th);
01220                         break;
01221                 case OUT_ATTR_SET:
01222                         rc = update_recovery_attr_set(env, sub_dt_obj,
01223                                                       op, params, ta,
01224                                                       st->st_sub_th);
01225                         break;
01226                 case OUT_XATTR_SET:
01227                         rc = update_recovery_xattr_set(env, sub_dt_obj,
01228                                                        op, params, ta,
01229                                                        st->st_sub_th);
01230                         break;
01231                 case OUT_INDEX_INSERT:
01232                         rc = update_recovery_index_insert(env, sub_dt_obj,
01233                                                           op, params, ta,
01234                                                           st->st_sub_th);
01235                         break;
01236                 case OUT_INDEX_DELETE:
01237                         rc = update_recovery_index_delete(env, sub_dt_obj,
01238                                                           op, params, ta,
01239                                                           st->st_sub_th);
01240                         break;
01241                 case OUT_WRITE:
01242                         rc = update_recovery_write(env, sub_dt_obj,
01243                                                    op, params, ta,
01244                                                    st->st_sub_th);
01245                         break;
01246                 case OUT_XATTR_DEL:
01247                         rc = update_recovery_xattr_del(env, sub_dt_obj,
01248                                                        op, params, ta,
01249                                                        st->st_sub_th);
01250                         break;
01251                 default:
01252                         CERROR("Unknown update type %u\n", (__u32)op->uop_type);
01253                         rc = -EINVAL;
01254                         break;
01255                 }
01256 next:
01257                 lu_object_put(env, &dt_obj->do_lu);
01258                 if (rc < 0)
01259                         break;
01260         }
01261 
01262         ta->ta_handle->th_result = rc;
01263         RETURN(rc);
01264 }
01265 
01285 int distribute_txn_replay_handle(struct lu_env *env,
01286                                  struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd,
01287                                  struct distribute_txn_replay_req *dtrq)
01288 {
01289         struct update_records   *records = &dtrq->dtrq_lur->lur_update_rec;
01290         struct thandle_exec_args *ta;
01291         struct lu_context       session_env;
01292         struct thandle          *th = NULL;
01293         struct top_thandle      *top_th;
01294         struct top_multiple_thandle *tmt;
01295         struct thandle_update_records *tur = NULL;
01296         int                     i;
01297         int                     rc = 0;
01298         ENTRY;
01299 
01300         /* initialize session, it is needed for the handler of target */
01301         rc = lu_context_init(&session_env, LCT_SERVER_SESSION | LCT_NOREF);
01302         if (rc) {
01303                 CERROR("%s: failure to initialize session: rc = %d\n",
01304                        tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_obd->obd_name, rc);
01305                 RETURN(rc);
01306         }
01307         lu_context_enter(&session_env);
01308         env->le_ses = &session_env;
01309         lu_env_refill(env);
01310         update_records_dump(records, D_HA, true);
01311         th = top_trans_create(env, NULL);
01312         if (IS_ERR(th))
01313                 GOTO(exit_session, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
01314 
01315         ta = &update_env_info(env)->uti_tea;
01316         ta->ta_argno = 0;
01317 
01318         update_env_info(env)->uti_dtrq = dtrq;
01319         /* Create distribute transaction structure for this top thandle */
01320         top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle, tt_super);
01321         rc = top_trans_create_tmt(env, top_th);
01322         if (rc < 0)
01323                 GOTO(stop_trans, rc);
01324 
01325         th->th_dev = tdtd->tdtd_dt;
01326         ta->ta_handle = th;
01327 
01328         /* check if the distribute transaction has been committed */
01329         tmt = top_th->tt_multiple_thandle;
01330         tmt->tmt_master_sub_dt = tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_bottom;
01331         tmt->tmt_batchid = dtrq->dtrq_batchid;
01332         tgt_th_info(env)->tti_transno = dtrq->dtrq_master_transno;
01333 
01334         if (tmt->tmt_batchid <= tdtd->tdtd_committed_batchid)
01335                 tmt->tmt_committed = 1;
01336 
01337         rc = update_recovery_exec(env, tdtd, dtrq, ta);
01338         if (rc < 0)
01339                 GOTO(stop_trans, rc);
01340 
01341         /* If no updates are needed to be replayed, then mark this records as
01342          * committed, so commit thread distribute_txn_commit_thread() will
01343          * delete the record */
01344         if (ta->ta_argno == 0)
01345                 tmt->tmt_committed = 1;
01346 
01347         tur = &update_env_info(env)->uti_tur;
01348         tur->tur_update_records = dtrq->dtrq_lur;
01349         tur->tur_update_records_buf_size = dtrq->dtrq_lur_size;
01350         tur->tur_update_params = NULL;
01351         tur->tur_update_param_count = 0;
01352         tmt->tmt_update_records = tur;
01353 
01354         distribute_txn_insert_by_batchid(tmt);
01355         rc = top_trans_start(env, NULL, th);
01356         if (rc < 0)
01357                 GOTO(stop_trans, rc);
01358 
01359         for (i = 0; i < ta->ta_argno; i++) {
01360                 struct tx_arg           *ta_arg;
01361                 struct dt_object        *dt_obj;
01362                 struct dt_device        *sub_dt;
01363                 struct sub_thandle      *st;
01364 
01365                 ta_arg = ta->ta_args[i];
01366                 dt_obj = ta_arg->object;
01367 
01368                 LASSERT(tmt->tmt_committed == 0);
01369                 sub_dt = lu2dt_dev(dt_obj->do_lu.lo_dev);
01370                 st = lookup_sub_thandle(tmt, sub_dt);
01371 
01372                 LASSERT(st != NULL);
01373                 LASSERT(st->st_sub_th != NULL);
01374                 rc = ta->ta_args[i]->exec_fn(env, st->st_sub_th,
01375                                              ta->ta_args[i]);
01376 
01377                 /* If the update is to update the reply data, then
01378                  * we need set the session information, so
01379                  * tgt_last_rcvd_update() can be called correctly */
01380                 if (rc == 0 && dt_obj == tdtd->tdtd_lut->lut_reply_data)
01381                         update_recovery_update_ses(env, tdtd, th,
01382                                                    st->st_sub_th, dtrq, ta_arg);
01383 
01384                 if (unlikely(rc < 0)) {
01385                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "error during execution of #%u from"
01386                                " %s:%d: rc = %d\n", i, ta->ta_args[i]->file,
01387                                ta->ta_args[i]->line, rc);
01388                         while (--i > 0) {
01389                                 if (ta->ta_args[i]->undo_fn != NULL) {
01390                                         dt_obj = ta->ta_args[i]->object;
01391                                         sub_dt =
01392                                                 lu2dt_dev(dt_obj->do_lu.lo_dev);
01393                                         st = lookup_sub_thandle(tmt, sub_dt);
01394                                         LASSERT(st != NULL);
01395                                         LASSERT(st->st_sub_th != NULL);
01396 
01397                                         ta->ta_args[i]->undo_fn(env,
01398                                                                st->st_sub_th,
01399                                                                ta->ta_args[i]);
01400                                 } else {
01401                                         CERROR("%s: undo for %s:%d: rc = %d\n",
01402                                              dt_obd_name(ta->ta_handle->th_dev),
01403                                                ta->ta_args[i]->file,
01404                                                ta->ta_args[i]->line, -ENOTSUPP);
01405                                 }
01406                         }
01407                         break;
01408                 }
01409                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: executed %u/%u: rc = %d\n",
01410                        dt_obd_name(sub_dt), i, ta->ta_argno, rc);
01411         }
01412 
01413 stop_trans:
01414         if (rc < 0)
01415                 th->th_result = rc;
01416         rc = top_trans_stop(env, tdtd->tdtd_dt, th);
01417         for (i = 0; i < ta->ta_argno; i++) {
01418                 if (ta->ta_args[i]->object != NULL) {
01419                         lu_object_put(env, &ta->ta_args[i]->object->do_lu);
01420                         ta->ta_args[i]->object = NULL;
01421                 }
01422         }
01423 
01424         if (tur != NULL)
01425                 tur->tur_update_records = NULL;
01426 
01427         if (tgt_ses_info(env)->tsi_exp != NULL) {
01428                 class_export_put(tgt_ses_info(env)->tsi_exp);
01429                 tgt_ses_info(env)->tsi_exp = NULL;
01430         }
01431 exit_session:
01432         lu_context_exit(&session_env);
01433         lu_context_fini(&session_env);
01434         RETURN(rc);
01435 }
01436 EXPORT_SYMBOL(distribute_txn_replay_handle);
